description:
These quick-dry shorts are perfect for sunny active days with a stretchy, adjustable waist, built-in UPF 50 sun protection, and water-and-stain resistance.
Zip and hand pockets, an internal key clip, and integrated D-ring offer multiple options for stashing your small essentials.
name: Columbia Sportswear Summerdry Shorts, 6" Inseam - Mens
